name: bohgan
normalized: (of course, i shouldn’t neglect monitoring them.
i got in touch with hans over the communications-line.

name: hans
normalized: 『yes, captain.

name: bohgan
normalized: major hans, i want your report on the monitoring status of both those women.

name: hans
normalized: 『as per your directives, their communications are being jammed.
i can also confirm that the magnetic interference we have created has made it impossible for them to measure our position on mars by means of a compass.
he responded as expected.
there were no complications, at least for now.

name: bohgan
normalized: is that so?
what about the surveillance cameras?

name: hans
normalized: 『the mother-daughter witch-duo have only left their rooms during meal times and the one time apart from that was when they made those inspection rounds.

name: bohgan
normalized: (was that too a part of their plans…?

name: hans
normalized: 『by the way, there is something else i want to report…』
hans hesitated to speak, unlike his usual self.

name: bohgan
normalized: what is it?

name: hans
normalized: 『the soldiers of the 87th division have been clamouring on about sightings of a ghost…』
on a battleship, rather on any big ship, there had always been stories about sightings of ghosts, since the olden days.
even in this modern era, when science and technology had advanced and humanity had come to settle on mars.

name: bohgan
normalized: sounds like nothing more than your usual ghost story!

name: bohgan
normalized: if they have time to talk about nonsense like that, tell them to focus on their job.

name: hans
normalized: 『yes.
please, excuse me.
hans replied in an embarrassed tone.

name: bohgan
normalized: broaden the surveillance, so that you can monitor them every single moment.

name: bohgan
normalized: the brainwashing and remodelling process is progressing smoothly.
the only concern should be them moving around during the day.
do you understand?
don’t neglect monitoring them!

name: hans
normalized: 『yes.
i hung up the phone.

name: bohgan
normalized: hmm…
my heart was telling me that something was amiss.

name: bohgan
normalized: (what is this feeling…?
the brainwashing and remodelling process had commenced and both those women were now as good as my prisoners.
the roles had finally been reversed now, ever since my massive defeat in the naval war at their hands.
and now, victory was within my grasp.
despite believing that, i couldn’t shake off that feeling.
there had to be a “catch”.
however, i couldn’t say what it was.
could it be something supernatural?
or had we missed out on some intelligence on the empress and the grim reaper during our investigation?
everything had so far been indicative of my imminent victory.
even so――
i was being warned by my instincts that something was amiss by those very instincts, that had saved me numerous times in the past.

name: bohgan
normalized: those witches are definitely up to something behind my back.
i clenched my back-teeth in frustration.
